title: Nutty Grilled Salad offers protein choice options
statement: RA Sushi's Nutty Grilled Salad is available with customer's choice of salmon or chicken protein.

citations.quote: NUTTY GRILLED SALAD Cashews, edamame, carrots and mixed greens tossed in Japanese vinaigrette; topped with avocado, mandarin oranges and fried noodles. Your choice of: Salmon Chicken
